comment.author: 44584976@N06
comment.authorname: P A S T E L H E A R T

comment.author: 86283268@N05
comment._content: 289 Court Street front view...glad to see what it looked like.  Supposedly the house was built in 1870 and in 1903 the owner at the time took a trip to Italy (was mentioned in a Sentinel story some years ago) and when he came back he wanted this home to have a porch with the look of an Italian Piazza, thus the roofed porch with awnings.  Sometime after than another owner had the porch glassed in as it now is.

comment.realname: Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County
comment.author: 25960495@N06
comment._content:
Thanks very much. Someone else said 288 Court St. I should drive by and look sometime!
Interesting about the porch.
comment.authorname: Keene and Cheshire County (NH) Historical Photos
